document_data.name: Yusendre
document_data.mainbody: '''Yusendre''' was one of the [[Nimbral Lords]] and one of the leading Elders.{{Cite web/Realmslore/The Realm of Nimbral, Part Eight: The Nimbral Lords}}
document_data.Personality: She was an impish fun-loving figure.
document_data.History:
Yusendre was forced to help her fellow Elder [[Skouloun]] to sell many rival wizards to the [[Shadovar]].

Yusendre escaped from the [[Spellplague]] in the {{YearlinkName|1385}}, using a ''[[gate]]'' to another [[plane]]. There she entered into stasis using the ''[[Phezult's sleep of ages]]'' spell.

Yusendre awoke around [[1487 DR]] and competed with Skouloun and other [[archmage]]s for possession of the [[Lost Spell]] during a [[spellstorm]]. However, she was killed by [[Tabra]] for her dealings with the Shadovar in [[Tarsakh]] of the {{yearlinkName|1488}}.
